Objet : Missing Stock 

 

Dear Jonathan,

 

Hope this email finds you well.

 

I have some unfortunate news!  

Harrods maintenance team had to carry out waste pipe replacement work which runs through our stock room this week on Monday night, we were asked to remove some stock ( was kept is safe place overnight ) so that work can be carried out. Everything was out back into our locked stockroom the following morning.  

 

On Wednesday night I noticed that out of 20 tigers ( paid order )  2 were missing, all 20 tigers were inside our stockroom, and we didn't need to empty this part of the stockroom while the works would carry out. On Monday night they were all there. Unfortunately, there are no cameras inside any stockrooms. 

 

We have done a thorough check everywhere yesterday and have reported this incident to both Harrods maintenance team and to security team. They are going to investigate and Misbha will follow up with them while I am on holiday. 

 

Dear Pauline,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Where do we stand with regards to insurance claim?  The retail price of each small tiger is £7,450.00. 

 

Kind Regards

Rakesh
